summary: First day at Wiom. Completed joining formalities. Woke up early and started day at 6 AM. Long commute (2 hours each side in metro) made it a heavy, draining day. Felt impact of social low-confidence—low voice, trouble with eye contact, and flat expressions were noticeable. Energy dipped early but managed to push through. Stability okay but underlying tension present.

wins: Showed up and completed all joining formalities despite early start and long commute
losses: Social confidence hit hard—voice low, eye contact hard, lack of expressive communication
ideas: Start building small behavioral anchors during commute or breaks—e.g., micro voice exercises or eye contact drills

goals: Survive this first week without burnout
Start observing social patterns and triggers without judgment
triggerEvents: Meeting new people in formal setting
